body:
Hello All,

This [doc](http://spack.readthedocs.io/en/wip/basic_usage.html?highlight=cdash) says there is support for different log formats including cdash:

```
$ spack help install
usage: spack install [-h] [--only {package,dependencies}] [-j JOBS]
                     [--keep-prefix] [--keep-stage] [-n] [-v] [--fake]
                     [--clean | --dirty] [--run-tests]
                     [--log-format {cdash,junit,cdash-simple}] [--redundant]
                     [--log-file LOG_FILE] [--site SITE] [--path PATH]
```

But I am only seeing juint : 

```
$ spack help install
usage: spack install [-h] [--only {package,dependencies}] [-j JOBS]
                     [--keep-prefix] [--keep-stage] [--restage] [--source]
                     [-n] [-v] [--fake] [-f] [--clean | --dirty] [--run-tests]
                     [--log-format {junit}] [--log-file LOG_FILE]
```

Am I missing anything ?
title: No support for cdash log format?
